note: human; filmmaker; work for ELCA Lutherans; 🏳️‍🌈&✊🏿ally; unorthodox christian; ex-Xian nationalist Republican; neurodiverse; he/him.   Exploring intersection of documentary film and Narrative Therapy.    📍Located on the unceded traditional homelands of the Council of the Three Fires: the Ojibwe, Odawa, and Potawatomi Nations.
